title: ExtendedStringPointObserver (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK FINAL ExtendedStringPointObserver EXTENDS
PointObserver
IMPLEMENTS IExtendedStringPointObserver
DNP3 Master datapoint observer for a datapoint of DNP3 object group 114 âextended stringsâ.
Unlike other datapoint observer ExtendedStringPointObserver doesnt provide the received data as an output variable,
but writes to an buffer provided by the caller if the datapoint changes.

rows.Name: pStrBuf
rows.Comment: Pointer to buffer where to store the Octet String value

rows: Maximum number of bytes to store in pStrBuf

Flags received from Outstation. Flag values are ORâdcombinations of the following:DNPDEFS_DBAS_FLAG_ON_LINE - the point has been readsuccessfullyDNPDEFS_DBAS_FLAG_RESTART - the field device that originated thedata object has been restarted. This device may be the deviced
reporting this data object.DNPDEFS_DBAS_FLAG_COMM_LOST - the device reporting this data objecthas lost communication with the originator of the data objectDNPDEFS_DBAS_FLAG_REMOTE_FORCED - the state of the binary objecthas been forced to its current state at the originating device
Update received from Outstation has a valid time stamp.

Time stamp reported - valid if hasTimeStamp = TRUE, invalid
otherwise.
